Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsWent out back to let the dog out and saw a red orb starlight object dip down diagonally to the left and then back up to the right, then fade away. It moved slowly but wasn't consistent in speed. Lasted about 10 seconds. You know when you see something straight. You know.
Summary: Red Orb / Starlight Dipped Diagonally, Back Up & Faded Away
